component.name: Combined!
component.summary: Combined! is a block puzzle game. Your goal is to connect blocks to get higher blocks on the board.
Combined! ist ein Blockrätselspiel. Dein Ziel ist es, Blöcke zu verbinden, um höhere Blöcke auf das Board zu bekommen.

description.p: Place three blocks with the same number and colour next to each other to connect them - horizontally, vertically or both. You can also rotate blocks before you place them!
